org.mxupdate.eclipse.properties
Class ProjectProperties

java.lang.Object
  org.mxupdate.eclipse.properties.ProjectProperties

public class ProjectProperties
extends Object

Wrapper for project specific properties to get better interface for values depending on different types. Also the event handling needed to update the related project property page if a property is updated is done.

Version:
$Id: ProjectProperties.java 781 2010-04-29 19:31:25Z tim.moxter $
Author:
The MxUpdate Team

Constructor Detail

ProjectProperties

public ProjectProperties(org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject _project)
                  throws org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException,
                         IOException
Initializes the properties for no property page.

Parameters:
_project - project for which the property file is opened
Throws:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException - if property file could not be created
IOException - if property file could not be opened and read

ProjectProperties

public ProjectProperties(org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject _project,
                         ProjectPropertyPage _propertyPage)
Initializes the properties for defined _propertyPage.

Parameters:
_project - project for which the property file is opened
_propertyPage - related property page
Method Detail

getImageConfig

public String getImageConfig()
Returns the string of the image configuration.

Returns:
string of the image configuration

storeImageConfig

public void storeImageConfig(String _imageConf)
                      throws Exception
Stores new image configuration _imageConf in the properties. To be sure that the newest properties exists, the properties will be loaded first, then updated and at least stored.

Parameters:
_imageConf - new image configuration
Throws:
Exception - if storing of the properties failed

getString

public String getString(String _key,
                        String _default)
Returns for given _key related string value in the properties. If no value for the _key is defined, the _default is returned.

Parameters:
_key - key of the property
_default - default string value of the property
Returns:
if key is defined related value; otherwise _default
See Also:
properties

setString

public void setString(String _key,
                      String _value)
Updates the property with _key in the properties. If the string property with the _key was signed as wrong, the "wrong" flag is removed. A valid check is done for the project property page (if the user could press the "done" button)..

Parameters:
_key - key of the property
_value - new string value of the property
See Also:
properties, wrongs, checkValuesValid()

getPassword

public String getPassword(String _key)
Returns the password from the properties with given _key. Because the passwords are encrypted in the properties, the password is decrypted and then returned.

Parameters:
_key - key of the password
Returns:
decrypted password string; if no password is defined in properties an empty string is returned
See Also:
properties

setPassword

public void setPassword(String _key,
                        String _value)
Defines with given _key a new password in the properties. The password is stored encrypted. If the password with the _key was signed as wrong, the "wrong" flag is removed. Avalid check is done for the project property page (if the user could press the "done" button)..

Parameters:
_key - key of the password
_value - new password
See Also:
properties, wrongs, checkValuesValid()

getBoolean

public boolean getBoolean(String _key,
                          boolean _default)
Returns for given _key related boolean value in the properties. If no value for the _key is defined, the _default is returned.

Parameters:
_key - key of the property
_default - default boolean value of the property
Returns:
if key is defined related value; otherwise _default
See Also:
properties

setBoolean

public void setBoolean(String _key,
                       boolean _value)
Updates the property with _key in the properties. The _value is converted to related string representation. If the boolean property with the _key was signed as wrong, the "wrong" flag is removed. A valid check is done for the project property page (if the user could press the "done" button)..

Parameters:
_key - key of the property
_value - new boolean value of the property
See Also:
properties, wrongs, checkValuesValid()

getInteger

public int getInteger(String _key,
                      int _default)
Returns for given _key related integer value in the properties. If no value for the _key is defined, the _default is returned.

Parameters:
_key - key of the property
_default - default integer value of the property
Returns:
if key is defined related value; otherwise _default
See Also:
properties

setInteger

public void setInteger(String _key,
                       int _value)
Updates the property with _key in the properties. The _value is converted to a string representation. If the integer property with the _key was signed as wrong, the "wrong" flag is removed. A valid check is done for the project property page (if the user could press the "done" button)..

Parameters:
_key - key of the property
_value - new integer value of the property
See Also:
properties, wrongs, checkValuesValid()

getMode

public ProjectMode getMode()
Returns current mode defined with key PREF_MODE in the properties. If the value is loaded once the value will be cached.

Returns:
defined mode in the properties
See Also:
PREF_MODE, mode

setMode

public void setMode(ProjectMode _mode)
Defines the new mode of the project. The mode is stored in the properties with key PREF_MODE.

Parameters:
_mode - new mode of the project
See Also:
PREF_MODE, mode

remove

public void remove(String _key)
Removes given property _key from properties.

Parameters:
_key - key of the property to remove

setWrong

public void setWrong(String _key)
Property with _key is defined as wrong. The related value is removed from properties.

Parameters:
_key - key of the property which is wrong
See Also:
wrongs

isWrong

public boolean isWrong(String _key)
Checks if the property with _key is wrong.

Parameters:
_key - property key to check
Returns:
true if property with _key is wrong; otherwise false

checkValuesValid

public void checkValuesValid()
Checks if the defined properties for current mode are correct.

load

public void load()
          throws org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException,
                 IOException
Loads from given _file the properties (if _file exists).

Throws:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException - if file could not be created
IOException - if file could not be opened and read
See Also:
PROP_FILE_NAME

store

public void store()
           throws org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException,
                  IOException
Stores current values of the properties in given _file. If the _file does not exists, the file is created.

Throws:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException - if file could not be created or updated
IOException - if properties could not be written
See Also:
PROP_FILE_NAME

decryptEncrypt

private String decryptEncrypt(String _password,
                              boolean _decrypt)
Returns encrypted/decrypted by salt password. Uses SHA-1 Message Digest Algorithm as defined in NIST's FIPS 180-1. The output of this algorithm is a 160-bit digest.

Parameters:
_password - password to encrypt / decrypt
_decrypt - true to decrypt or false to encrypt
Returns:
decrypted / encrypted by salt password
See Also:
PDE_ALGORITHM, PDE_PASSWORD, PDE_SALT, PDE_ITERATION
